title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\MachineSpec
name: MachineSpec
description:
Specification of a single machine.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.MachineSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.machine_type
params.description: Immutable. The type of the machine. See the list of machine types supported for prediction See the list of machine types supported for custom training. For [DeployedModel][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.DeployedModel] this field is optional, and the default value is n1-standard-2. For [BatchPredictionJob][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.BatchPredictionJob] or as part of [WorkerPoolSpec][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.WorkerPoolSpec] this field is required.

params.name: data.accelerator_type
params.description: Immutable. The type of accelerator(s) that may be attached to the machine as per [accelerator_count][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.MachineSpec.accelerator_count].

params.name: data.accelerator_count
params.description: The number of accelerators to attach to the machine.
